The top players in baseball are typically those who excel in batting, pitching, and fielding. Some of the most successful players in the sport are Babe Ruth, Hank Aaron, Barry Bonds, and Alex Rodriguez.

The top players in baseball are typically judged on their batting average, runs scored, home runs, RBIs (runs batted in), and stolen bases. Popular players in the sport include Mike Trout, Mookie Betts, Christian Yelich, and Cody Bellinger.
